alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Jasper; Jefferson; Orange (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 04 at 9:06PM CDT until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Lake Charles LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... Neches River at Neches River Saltwater Barrier For the Neches River...including Town Bluff, Evadale, Neches River Saltwater Barrier...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday evening at 915 PM CDT. && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Neches River at Neches River Saltwater Barrier. * WHEN...From Thursday morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 5.0 feet, Water is about two feet over portions of Four Oaks Ranch Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 3.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning and continue rising to 4.0 feet tomorrow morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
